abilityDesc:
Red-Feathered Page: When team members trigger Electrified Reactions, increases Knowledge Unit by [$_1] for 2 Cycles. When team members trigger Triggering Supercharged Reactions increases Knowledge Unit by [$_2] for 4 Cycles.
Blue-Feathered Page: When the equipped character's Normal Skill deals Tide or Volte DMG, increases Knowledge Unit by [$_3] for 2 Cycles.
When both Red-Feathered Page and Blue-Feathered Page are in effect, all team members' Electrified DMG is increased by [$_4], and their Supercharged DMG is increased by [$_5]. This effect cannot stack.
